name: Dr. Sarah Chen
title: Chief AI Officer
bio: Dr. Sarah Chen is a leading expert in artificial intelligence and machine learning with over 15 years of experience. She has published 50+ research papers and holds 12 patents in AI technology. Previously led AI initiatives at Google and Microsoft.

name: Marcus Rodriguez
title: Senior Cloud Architect
bio: Marcus is a certified cloud architect with expertise in AWS, Azure, and GCP. He has designed and implemented cloud solutions for Fortune 500 companies and is a frequent speaker at tech conferences worldwide.

name: Elena Volkov
title: Cybersecurity Director
bio: Elena has 12 years of experience in cybersecurity, specializing in threat intelligence and incident response. She holds CISSP and CISM certifications and has helped organizations defend against advanced persistent threats.

name: Dr. James Liu
title: Quantum Computing Researcher
bio: Dr. Liu is a quantum computing pioneer with a PhD in Physics from MIT. He has contributed to major breakthroughs in quantum algorithms and is currently working on practical quantum computing applications.

name: Emma Thompson
title: Senior Frontend Engineer
bio: Emma is a core contributor to React and has been instrumental in developing React 18 features. She's passionate about developer experience and has created several popular open-source tools used by millions of developers.

name: Alex Kumar
title: Platform Engineering Lead
bio: Alex leads platform engineering at ScaleOps, managing Kubernetes clusters that serve millions of users. He's an expert in container orchestration and has contributed to several CNCF projects.

name: Rachel Martinez
title: Security Architect
bio: Rachel specializes in zero trust architecture and has helped numerous enterprises transition from traditional perimeter-based security to modern zero trust models. She's a CISSP and holds advanced certifications in cloud security.

name: David Park
title: MLOps Engineering Manager
bio: David has extensive experience in building and scaling machine learning infrastructure. He leads a team that manages ML pipelines processing billions of predictions daily and is an advocate for ML best practices.

name: Lisa Chang
title: Edge Computing Specialist
bio: Lisa is at the forefront of edge computing technology, working on solutions that bring computation closer to data sources. She has designed edge architectures for autonomous vehicles and IoT applications.

name: Michael Foster
title: Blockchain Developer
bio: Michael is a full-stack blockchain developer with expertise in Ethereum, Solidity, and DeFi protocols. He has built several successful dApps and is passionate about the future of decentralized technology.
